Posts.Content: Apr 13, 2017 08:13AM Cheryl11 wrote: I'm waiting for my Chek 2 results to make a decision about my course of treatment. Recently diagnosed with Stage I Lobular. My sister was Chek 2 positive, Stage II Lobular. Had double mastectomies, chemo, and hysterectomy at 44. I'm pretty certain I will be positive too. We have another younger sister who is being tested for Chek 2.
Posts.Title: Anyone out there with the Chek2 gene mutation??? MNTaylor80 kber
